creator: andy.wood@yoomedia.com
text:
cvsversion.html documentation lists property attributes as: cvsserverproperty cvsclientproperty When they're actually: serverversionproperty clientversionproperty It is correctly documented in the CvsVersion.java javadoc. The HTML could do with a

since Ant 1.6.1

line too.

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
Fixed in cvs, should be available for the next release ant.
Thanks.
